channel.title: I be needing help!
channel.description:
[size=15pt]Ok I need the code for an NPC to say Owner is ONLINE or OFFLINE...
SOMEONE HELP MEH PLZ!!![/size]

item.title: I be needing help!
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:


}
                    }
                    if (npcs[i].npcType == 0) {
                        if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) {
                            npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                            if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("YourName")){
                            npcs[i].textUpdate = "The owner and coder YourNameis ONLINE";
                            }
                            else{
                            npcs[i].textUpdate = "The owner and coder YourName is OFFLINE";
                            }
                            }
                            }

You also have to add the Npc 0 into autospawn.cfg

item.title: I be needing help!
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

For Czar Sources:

Place this is NPCHandler.java under your NPC dialouges

} else if (npcs[i].npcType == XXXX) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) // this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Owner")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner is OFFLINE"; } } }
XXXX Stands for the NPC ID

if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Owner")) {

The “Owner” bit must be the exact name of the Owner or it wont work

Read full topic
